# AI Agent Configuration & Skill Development

Standardized methods for extending AI capabilities.

## Skill Structure

- Every skill must have a `SKILL.md`.
- Use YAML frontmatter for metadata.
- Focus on actionable patterns rather than abstract theory.

## Plugin & MCP

- Documentation for MCP server integrations.
- Settings and structure for custom plugins.
